// Typography colors
$sc-color-h1: $sc-color-copy-dark; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Color"}) */
$sc-color-h2: $sc-color-copy-dark; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Color"}) */
$sc-color-h3: $sc-color-copy; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Color"}) */
$sc-color-h4: $sc-color-copy-dark; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Color"}) */
$sc-color-h5: $sc-color-copy; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Color"}) */
$sc-color-h6: $sc-color-copy; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Color"}) */
$sc-color-paragraph: $sc-color-copy; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Color"}) */
$sc-color-blockquote: $sc-color-copy;

// Footer variables
$sc-footer-background-color: #000; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Background color"}) */
$sc-footer-text-color: #fff; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Text color"}) */

// Link variables
$sc-footer-link-color: #aaa; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Link color"}) */
$sc-footer-link-color-hover: $sc-neutral-shade-300; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Link hover color"}) */
$sc-footer-icon-color: $sc-neutral-shade-500; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Icon color"}) */
$sc-footer-icon-hover-color: $sc-neutral-shade-300; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Icon hover color"}) */

// Headings variables
$sc-footer-headings-color: white; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Column headings color"}) */
$sc-footer-headings-size: $sc-font-size-l; /* editable({"type": "string", "label": "Headings size"}) */

// Input fields variables
$sc-footer-fields-background-color: white; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Input background color"}) */
$sc-footer-fields-border-color: white; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Input border color"}) */
$sc-footer-fields-text-color: $sc-neutral-shade-300; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Input text color"}) */

// Copyright color
$sc-footer-copyright-text-color: white; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Copyright text color"}) */
$sc-footer-copyright-background-color: $sc-footer-background-color; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Copyright background color - mobile/tablet"}) */
$sc-footer-desktop-copyright-background-color: $sc-footer-background-color; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Copyright background color - desktop"}) */
$sc-footer-copyright-border-color: transparent; /* editable({"type": "color", "label": "Copyright top border color"}) */
